name: GroceryRush
description:
Grocery Rush!!! A fun game where every single item has physics and you can destroy the whole store while rushing around with your shopping cart! Donations are greatly appreciated and will help me continue to develop this game!

Contact me: droidsbd@gmail.com

CONTROLS:

Player 1:

WASD to move
Q to move arm left
E to move arm right
R to move arm up
F to move arm down
1 and 2 to switch camera view(SinglePlayerOnly)
H to restart game

Player 2:

Arrow Keys to move 
< to move arm left 
> to move arm right 
' to move arm up 
/ to move arm down 

Current Features:

-Multiplayer! (Splitscreen)
-Every item has physics 
-Soda Bottles 
-Wine Bottles 
-Cereal boxes 
-Malk Cartons (not a typo hehe) 
-Toy Trucks
-Shopping carts
-Rad Chips

Planned Features:

-More items!!!
-Low Gravity mode???
-Better playermodels
-Add guns, (to shoot stuff around, off the shelves, etc)

Known Issues:
No known issues at the moment

https://www.blender.org/download/
